medical_history.chief_complaint: RUQ abdominal pain and nausea for 36-48 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Intermittent crampy abdominal pain in RUQ radiating to the back started approximately 3 months ago, lasting 1x/week with associated nausea. The recent episode began around 12pm while typing at work, progressively worsened throughout the day, and was associated with chills, resolving a couple of hours prior to examination.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cholelithiasis, Helicobacter pylori, Hyperlipidemia, Personal history of pneumonia (recurrent).
